summary: The action takes place in a typical French town in the early sixties, at the end of the Algerian war. In a fit of criminal madness, a married, affluent and respected town-citizen named ... See full summary »
cast: Jean-Pierre Darroussin|Isabelle Habiague|Pascal Elso|Igor Mendjisky|Éric Naggar|Lahcen Razzougui|Jean-Yves Chatelais|Jacques Bachelier|Philippe Couerre|Yvon Wust|Jean-Paul Bonnaire|Hubert Saint-Macary|Laurent Manzoni|Olivier Piechaczyk|Lucy Flamant|Alain Moussay|Tobias Kempf|Dominique Jacquot|Pascale Lequesne|Philippe Ohrel|Jean-Marie Holterbach|Roland Brodbeck|Daniel Burgart|Marie Seux|Rebecca Rieth|Alexandre Cantini|Francisco Gil|Marc Schweyer|Catherine Javaloyès|Nathalie Mercier|Morgane Hainaux|Antoine Philippot|Pierre-Etienne Vilbert|Marc Denis|Christophe Feltz|Frédéric Solunto|Raphaël Scheer|Julien Siehr|Françoise Félicité
title: Le septième juré
